show.title: Talent in the Shadows
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/eQGpUX
show.description: Once the revered principal of India’s top martial arts school, Dharmesh is betrayed and poisoned by his best friend, left for dead. Six months later, he’s found alive—with no memory but instincts that saved him. Taken in by a kind father-daughter duo at Eden Fight Club, he starts a quiet life as a helper, until flashes of his past resurface. As Dharmesh pieces together his identity and the betrayal he suffered, a growing bond with Geet, the daughter, gives him strength. With his memories restored and purpose reignited, he prepares to confront the enemies who tried to erase him.
